definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: place (so Eg. Aram., Nab., Palm.; Vulgate; Syr. 0atar place; Zinj. [[אשר]] Lzb:229 f.; Ar. 0’i3run footstep; cf. Heb. [[אֲשׁוּר]] and sub [[אֲשֶׁר]]);—place

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Da 2:35 [[וְכָל־אֲחַר לָא־הִשְׁתְּכַח לְהוֹן]], Ezr 5:15 [[וּבֵית אֱלָהָא יִתְבְנֵא עַל־אַתְרֵהּ]], Ezr 6:3, Ezr 6:5, Ezr 6:7. Hence

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[בָּאתַר]] (Da 7:6 Baer [[בָּתַר]]) after (lit. in the track of: so Zinj. [[באשר]] (Cooke:160 f., 170), Palm. Vulgate [[בָּתַר]], Syr. botar), [[בָּאתַר דְּנָה]] after this, Da 7:6, Da 7:7, sf. Da 2:39 [[וּבָֽתָרָח]] and after thee.
